00057 #define SSTR(x) #x
00058 
00059 #define CREATE_SERVER_PROPERTIES(server, host, port)\
00060     session->createString(SSTR(server##ServerHost), #server" server host", #host);\
00061     session->createInt(SSTR(server##ServerPort), #server" server port", port);\
00062     Network::UDPSocket* server##Socket = new UDPSocket();\
00063     serverMap.insert(std::make_pair(#server, server##Socket));
00064     
00065 #define SELECT_CHECK(server, parseFunction)\
00066     ServerAddressMap::iterator server##_it = serverMap.find(#server);\
00067     if(server##_it != serverMap.end() && FD_ISSET(server##_it->second->getSocket(), &readSet)){\
00068         std::string data;\
00069         InetAddress server##Addr;\
00070         int server##result = server##_it->second->recv(data, server##Addr);\
00071         parsedData = parseFunction(data);\
00072     }
